H0.text: Eunice was the mother of which New Testament figure, the recipient of two epistles from Saint Paul. Apollos

H1.text: Eunice was the mother of which New Testament figure, the recipient of two epistles from Saint Paul. Silas

H2.text: Eunice was the mother of which New Testament figure, the recipient of two epistles from Saint Paul. Barnabas

H3.text: Eunice was the mother of which New Testament figure, the recipient of two epistles from Saint Paul. Timothy

A4.text: According to the New Testament, Eunice was the mother of Timothy

A5.text: Eunice is identified by name only in 2 Timothy 1:5
